resources.string:
Offer !!!
I invite you to Cocktail in Restaurante Mediterraneo Havana
Make reservation
+53 7 832 4894
The rest goes for you

Maecenas is everyone who wants to invite their friends and contacts to visit our restaurant. For them, the restaurant offers a free cocktail. For each new Maecena, our restaurant opens a count in which he will accumulate credit for each one of his friends who visits us.

 Also, if you wish, your name will be inscribed for future invitations in our activities. Your friends and contacts only need to make reservation by this phone +537 832 4894
 Or present on your name to our Room Captain.
I request to register as a maecenas\nmy name is\n

"Hours: 12:00 M to 12:00 AM.

 Phone: +53 7 832 4894

 Address: Street 13, No. 406 e/ F y G, Vedado, Plaza de la Revolución

 Site: www.medhavana.com"
The Mediterranean-Havana restaurant offers a selection of fresh and natural products that come directly from the sea and the land.

We are provided by local farms and fisher boats, allowing us to count with own production and processing, absent of preservatives and additives, controlling at every step the quality of what we offer.
Our culinary team combines Mediterranean cuisine traditions, on the hands of Luigi, our Chef native of Sardinia, with the merge and experience of our local cuisine.
We hope the passion we put in the food we prepare and the service we offer, led you to enjoy this pleasant environment, full of Mediterranean flavors, making you feel in family.
The Vista Hermosa farm provides us with fresh and natural products, together we form a genuine project from farm to table.
